markets.question: Will there be a COVID-19 variant more transmissible than Omicron in 2024?
markets.description: This market will resolve to 'Yes' if a COVID-19 variant is identified that has a higher basic reproduction number (R0) than the Omicron variant (estimated R0 of 5-8).

markets.question: Will BTC reach $100,000 by end of 2024?
markets.description: This market resolves based on the closing price of Bitcoin (BTC) on December 31, 2024.

markets.question: Will the US enter a recession in 2024?
markets.description: This market resolves to 'Yes' if the NBER declares a US recession during 2024.

markets.question: Will Taylor Swift announce retirement in 2024?
markets.description: This market resolves based on official announcement from Taylor Swift or her representatives.

markets.question: Will SpaceX land humans on Mars by 2030?
markets.description: This market resolves to 'Yes' if SpaceX successfully lands humans on Mars surface by December 31, 2030.

markets.question: Will AI pass the Turing Test by 2025?
markets.description: This market resolves based on consensus among AI researchers that an AI system has passed a rigorous Turing Test.
